title: Bloomberg Markets: Briggs on Making Sense of Tech for Business
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Briggs on Making Sense of Tech for Business
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Bill Briggs Chief Technology Officer Deloitte Consulting Discussing the evolving changes in tech, such as virtual reality, and what companies need to know to keep up.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
